title: New: EXES – Like You
content:
EXES’s Twentythousand released earlier this year became somewhat of a semi-viral hit, clocking up close to a million streams across various platforms and a whole host of online support.

The follow-up, Like You, comes across like a sugary sweet yet savage rebuttal of a former lover, sticking the knife in whilst also reminiscing back to simpler times, all wrapped up in some shiny pop production. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
